meanings.sent1: The heritability of blue eyes in the family is evident.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the heritability of certain traits to understand genetic inheritance.
meanings.sent3: The heritability of his love for pizza is undeniable.
meanings.sent4: The heritability of intelligence can sometimes surprise us.
meanings.sent5: Understanding the heritability of diseases can help in prevention strategies.

meanings.definition: The proportion of phenotypic variation in a population that is due to genetic variation.
meanings.sent1: The heritability of height in a group of siblings can vary.
meanings.sent2: Researchers use statistical methods to estimate the heritability of certain traits.
meanings.sent3: The heritability of laughter in that room was contagious.
meanings.sent4: The heritability of success can be influenced by various factors.
meanings.sent5: The heritability of athletic abilities can be seen in many families.
